value.title: How to refresh web sources in Power BI service

value.title: How to translate Power BI reports (or any text) Live
value.excerpt: Have you ever had the need to work with a Power BI file in a different language that those you know? Or travelled somewhere where you couldnt speak the language?  In today's video, I will show you how to translate any text live. No more language barriers :)  Here you can download all the pbix files:

value.title: Import data from Facebook API in Power BI (Part 2)
value.excerpt: On Part 1 we showed you how to use the Power BI connector. In this video we skip the connector altogether and show you how to import data from the Facebook API into Power BI. We also show you how to get all comments from posts into Power BI. Enjoy!   Looking for a download file? Go to our Download Center:

Enjoy"  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column.
